name: 方块人 Cube Human
description:
Cube Human is build in a floating world.There are many tools, such as cube, that you can move, push or grasp depending on the size of the mass.Local co-op for 10 players.Cube Human has the skills of switching suspension direction and accelerating leap. The city is the main stage of the cube human.
Featrue
1.Motion mode control of racing car.

2.Simple control

3.Polygon Frame

4.local coop,ten players most.

5.in a floating world,a new style world.
